Literature.Title: A promising antibiotic candidate, brevinin-1 analogue 5R, against drug-resistant bacteria, with insights into its membrane-targeting mechanism
Literature.Author: Zou W, Sun R, Yao A, Zhou M, Chen X, Ma C, Wang T, Jiang Y, Chen T, Shaw C, Wang L

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MBC=2µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 12493(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 12493(MBC=4µM),Enterococcus faecalis NCTC 12697(MIC=4µM),Enterococcus faecalis NCTC 12697(MBC=8µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MIC=2µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MIC=4µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MBC=2µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 43816(MIC=8µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 43816(MBC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MBC=8µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC BAA-747(MIC=4µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC BAA-747(MBC=4µM)
